All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
Abstract Data Access Object (DAO) class to implement basic CRUD operations.
Bill
Represents a bill issued for a placed order.
BillBLL
Business Logic Layer for managing bills.
BillDAO
Data Access Object for the Bill entity.
Client
Represents a client entity with personal information, such as name, email, address, age and ID.
ClientBLL
Business Logic Layer for managing clients.
ClientDAO
Data Access Object for Client.
ClientWindow
A JavaFX BorderPane for displaying clients in a TableView.
ConnectionFactory
Connection factory class responsible for creating and managing the connection with the database.
HelloController
 
MainApp
The main application class for the Order Management System.
Order
Represents an order placed by a client.
OrderBLL
Business Logic Layer for managing orders.
OrderDAO
Data Access Object for the Order entity.
OrderView
A model class representing an order with extensive details.
OrderWindow
A JavaFX VBox for displaying orders in a TableView, with bill display.
Product
Represents a product with a name, price and available stock.
ProductBLL
Business Logic Layer for managing product operations.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object for the Product entity.
ProductWindow
JavaFX BorderPane for displaying products in a TableView.
Table
Utility class for configuring JavaFX TableView dynamically based on the fields of a given data model.
UnderStockException
Custom exception thrown when a product does not have enough stock to fulfill an order.
